channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Rubbish Fire; INC#0467; 09:14AM; Nb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GyOkPF; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fires in 40 minutes with no injuries reported. No structures were damaged.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E2 E209 E290 E4 E447 E458 E9 E90 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 T90; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Rubbish Fire; INC#0467; 08:34AM; Nb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GyOkPF; Boyle Heights; Preliminary reports of a palm tree fire which has evolved into three areas of light grass / brush burning in the vicinity of NB 5 Fwy x Soto St. There are no structures threatened and currently no wind. Additional resources requested due to the different locations. No injuries reported.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 CM22 E10 E2 E209 E290 E4 E447 E458 E9 E90 EM1 H3 HA3 RA25 T90; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0277; 05:28AM; 5015 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46KXDGI; South Park; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters extinguished the fire in 30 minutes with no injuries reported. While initially it appeared the fire extended to an adjacent one story commercial building, upon investigation it was found to be only residual smoke. No further details. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E203 E21 E211 E221 E226 E233 E264 E285 E33 E5 E57 E66 E9 E95 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA33 RA5 SQ21 SQ95 T11 T21 T26 T3 T33 T64 T85 UR5 UR88; CH9; 1 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0277; 04:58AM; 5015 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46KXDGI; South Park; One story commercial building with heavy smoke showing with two buildings exposed (on either side) Additional resources enroute ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM20 CM22 E203 E21 E211 E221 E226 E233 E264 E285 E33 E5 E57 E66 E9 E95 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA33 RA5 SQ21 SQ95 T11 T21 T26 T3 T33 T64 T85 UR5 UR88; CH9; 1 13 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0133; 03:39AM; 1107 W 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RDz0Yo; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters battled for one hour and 34 minutes to extinguish a well involved, large two story craftsman style home with exposures on three sides. There are no injuries reported. Crews will remain onscene through the morning for overhaul operations. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E215 E226 E227 E233 E266 E3 E34 E46 E66 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA46 RA846 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T26 T27 T33 T66 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0133; 02:59AM; 1107 W 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RDz0Yo; Vermont Square; Firefighters are making good progress against the primary fire unit (well involved large two story craftsman) and have extinguished all fire on the exposed buildings. There are exposures on three sides with varying degrees of damage sustained. There are no injuries reported. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E215 E226 E227 E233 E266 E3 E34 E46 E66 E95 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA46 RA846 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T26 T27 T33 T66 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0133; 02:05AM; 1107 W 41st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RDz0Yo; Vermont Square; Large, two story single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Additional resources enroute. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E14 E15 E215 E226 E227 E233 E266 E3 E34 E46 E66 E95 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA246 RA846 SQ21 SQ95 T15 T26 T27 T33 T66 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1946; 10:53PM; 4519 W Brunswick Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Rz9CCK; Atwater Village; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. The sole occupant was outside the home upon LAFD arrival. The fire was prevented from extending to the adjoining units. No further details.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC2 BC5 E235 E250 E35 E42 E56 RA55 RA56 SO1 T35 T50; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1946; 10:35PM; 4519 W Brunswick Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Rz9CCK; Atwater Village; One story four-plex with fire showing from one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC2 BC5 E235 E250 E35 E42 E56 RA55 RA56 SO1 T35 T50; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1718; 08:26PM; 888 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uNE6YV; Downtown; Firefighters extinguished 3 fully involved autos and completed searches to ensure no victims inside. The final auto is an electric vehicle which will take copious amounts of water to extinguish. No further details and no further updates anticipated. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA209 RA810 SQ21 T10 T9; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart
